 1998-04091998-03-190,  ,  LAB,  , 
PrecisONTARIO HYDRO NUCLEAR FACILITIES EXCLUSION FROM PART III OF THE CANADA LABOUR CODE REGULATIONS (LABOUR STANDARDS) which allow the Government of Ontario, through an agreement with the federal government, to administer and enforce provincial labour laws with respect to Ontario Hydro nuclear facilities employees, as of April 1, 1998.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1998-0181 Publication Date: 1998-04-01
